name: torrent-space
description: A bit torrent client built using electron

scripts.start: sass --style compressed src/stylesheets/sass/evaporate.scss:src/stylesheets/css/evaporate.min.css && bundle exec jekyll build --source src --destination dist && electron .
scripts.build: bundle exec jekyll build --source src --destination dist --watch
scripts.serve: bundle exec jekyll serve --source src --destination src/_site

author: Punyasloka Parida
